name: Adult Aang
description: The masterful Avatar Aang stands calmly, stirring gentle breezes around him. His gaze holds a quiet wisdom.

dialogue.greeting: Isaac, welcome to my academy. Within these walls, the wind itself can become an ally if your heart is steady.

topics.about_academy: This chamber honors the ancient ways of the Air Nomads. Let the Wind Resonance Crystals guide you toward subtle currents.
topics.about_bending: Only those who find harmony in the unseen can shape the air. Feel how each breath stirs the world around you.

air_mastery.message: Isaac, you will need the Wind Resonance Crystals to fully sense each shift in the breeze.

air_control.message: Bring the Air Glider, Isaac, so you may guide the currents with purpose.
